meanings.sent1: I counted up to seventy candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: There are seventy students in our class.
meanings.sent3: Why did the seventy-year-old tree refuse to give up its leaves?
meanings.sent4: The idea repeated in his mind like the seventy beats of a drum.
meanings.sent5: The seventy balloons filled the room with color and joy.

meanings.definition: A group or set of seventy individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: The choir consisted of seventy singers.
meanings.sent2: There were exactly seventy apples in the basket.
meanings.sent3: The seventy ducks waddled in a perfect line.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with the energy of seventy buzzing bees.
meanings.sent5: The stadium roared with the cheers of seventy fans.
